blessing_card_1_desc:
Believe in your cause and act boldly, then no one shall be thy judge.
May the ode of the God of Justice be with you, and your pure and noble nature forever stand fast.
blessing_card_2_desc:
Honored contracts and laws obeyed — compassionate, righteous, and fair.
May you remain as steadfast as stone in the face of all the difficulties and challenges that come your way.
blessing_card_3_desc:
May the blessings of the God of Wisdom accompany you in all your journeys to come.
As the puzzles and challenges you face are readily solved, so shall you emerge more knowledgeable and powerful than before~
blessing_card_4_desc:
Like a distant Shogun's passion for martial prowess, your will to power drives you on.
May the eternal blessings of thunder be bestowed upon you, and the field of battle remain forever yours.
blessing_card_5_desc:
An untethered soul is never restricted by rules or common logic.
Let the wind lead as you journey onward. May poetic currents carry you off to faraway places, like a Dandelion of Mondstadt~
blessing_card_bottom_tips: Share this Blessing Card on social media for a chance to win a Genshin Impact figure!
copy_text: Help the Melusines complete their survey to obtain Primogems and other in-game rewards, as well as a little surprise! https://hoyo.link/ekJgFBAL
e-loading-tip1: Help Aeval and Elphane with their research~
e-loading-tip2: Obtain Primogems and other in-game rewards, as well as a little surprise!
e-loading-tip3: Share on social media for a chance to win a Genshin Impact figure!
next_question_tips: Please answer the current question before checking the next one~
novice_guide:
Aeval and Elphane have been tasked with carrying out a travelers' survey. Apparently there'll be a little surprise for those who complete it~
Let's go give it a try! We'll be helping Aeval and Elphane get their work done too, hehe!
question_1_desc: When you discover a Crystalfly, which of the following do you prefer to capture it with?
question_2_desc: If you'd like to send a gift to a faraway friend, which of the following would you choose?
question_3_desc: Which of the following scenic spots would you most want to visit?
question_4_desc: If you had to fight one of the following, which would you choose?
rewards_pop_tips: Rewards will be sent to you via in-game mail within 5–10 minutes. Don't forget to claim them!
rule_content:
● Event Duration: 2023/12/25 12:00 – 2024/01/07 23:59 (UTC+8)

● Raffle Prize Results Announcement: Before January 12, 2024

● Primogem Rewards Claim Time: Within 30 days of receiving the mail

Event Description

The two Fontainian aquabus tour guides Aeval and Elphane have been tasked with carrying out a survey of travelers visiting Fontaine.

In return, those who complete the survey will be given a little Blessing Card that shows their survey results. Come find out what yours will be!

Event Rewards

● Complete the survey to obtain Primogems ×40, Hero's Wit, and other in-game rewards.

● Share your survey results with the hashtag #GenshinMelusinesSurvey on Twitter (X), Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, VK, or other social media platforms for a chance to win:

Primogems ×160 (100 Winners)

Genshin Impact Ganyu Figure (10 Winners)

※ Sharing on HoYoLAB does not count towards raffle participation.

User Terms and Conditions

・Please log in to the event using your HoYoverse Account and select your corresponding character in Genshin Impact to take part. This will ensure that your rewards can be sent and claimed correctly. You must reach Adventure Rank 10 or above to participate in this event.

・After helping Aeval and Elphane complete their survey, the in-game rewards will be distributed via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.

・Players who share their survey results with the specified hashtag #GenshinMelusinesSurvey on Twitter (X), Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, VK, or other social media platforms will be entered into the raffle and have a chance to win Primogems ×160 or a Genshin Impact figure.

・If you post and win on multiple platforms, you'll only be rewarded once. Winning information will be sent out via private messages.

・The list of winners will be posted on the various official social media accounts for different languages. Relevant information will also be sent to the winners via private messages.

・Primogem rewards obtained from the raffle will be issued via in-game mail within 20 business days of the winners list being announced. The mail is valid for 30 days. You will be deemed to have forfeited your rewards if you fail to claim them before the mail expires, so don't forget to claim them in time.

・Winners will be informed of the specific issuance time for Genshin Impact figures won in the raffle via private messages.

・This event will be held and judged on multiple platforms. The event rewards will be shared across all platforms, and will not be distributed proportionately between different platforms/regions.

・If the issuance of rewards fails due to the player providing the incorrect UID or delivery address, the official team will not re-issue said rewards.

・If you have any queries about the event, please contact our Customer Service at genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com or via the in-game Feedback feature.

・There is a possibility that this event may be changed or ended without notice.
share_desc:
Help the Melusines complete their survey to obtain Primogems and other in-game rewards, as well as a little surprise!
Share on social media for a chance to win a Genshin Impact figure!
